Text: Doesn't appear to be legit.  Teen Wolf Season 2 not released until June.
Season 2 begin June 3 2012 and the first episode is called Omega

warefox... if it claimed to be the first episode your comments might have been valid.
It's a MTV special summarising the first season in prep of season 2 for people who didn't watch the first or want a refresher. It also has a sneak peek at season 2. Hence the ep number 2x00 and title "Origins Special".
This is a "Special" as indicated. It's not S02E01!
